extended_input_schema.name: key
extended_input_schema.label: Key
extended_input_schema.hint:
Message key, to be stored with the message.
                   A key can be used by Kafka for selecting an appropriate topic partition
                   (when partition is not assigned explicitly). Only string keys are supported.

extended_input_schema.name: partition
extended_input_schema.label: Partition
extended_input_schema.hint:
You can explicitly publish message to the specific topic partition
                    (index starts from 0). Otherwise Kafka will select partition automatically.
